Text.Page:
I don't have the time to worry about stupid archaeologists when I've got creatures wandering every which way.

Speaking of which, you look idle. Go kill some of those {@LinkCreature:18#16#rubblemaker golems} and bring me their cores. I want to string them together and make a rope around the city.
Well done! I'd ask you to string these together for me, but I see another slacker who needs a task....

Are you stupid as well as idle? Going to get lost like that useless archaeologist?

You're after {@LinkCreature:18#16#rubblemaker golems} and {@LinkCreature:18#15#rockcrawler scavengers}. Go on.
